article:
'Programming' is a form of music production and performance using electronic
devices, such as sequencers, to generate music. Programming is used in nearly
all forms of electronic music and in most hip hop music since the 1990s. It is
also frequently used in modern pop and rock music from various regions of the
world, and sometimes in jazz and contemporary classical music. In the 21st
century, programming has been incorporated into various styles of post-hardcore
and metalcore music. Collins, N., McLean, A., Rohrhuber, J. & Ward, A.
(2003), "Live Coding Techniques for Laptop Performance", Organised Sound 8(3):
321â30.
